message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV 

This paper is about improving text document classification using embeddings. The most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and text classification. The second likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning) as the paper proposes a new method for learning document embeddings. The third likely sub-category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as document classification is a common task in information retrieval. The fourth likely sub-category is cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as the paper proposes a new method for representing text documents. The fifth likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision) as the paper uses multi-sense embeddings which are also used in computer vision tasks.
